moves.1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 d6 3. d4 cxd4 4. Nxd4 Nf: Holy macrol here we go lions, tigers, and bears!
moves.18... Rd8: If dxc5 d6 Bxd6 Qd6 Qd6 Rd6 Rd8 Rxd7 Rxd7 Rd1
moves.21. gxh6 gxh6 22. f4: I'm trying to bust open the center. That's my excuse for not taking the h6 pawn.
moves.22... Nf6 23. fxe5 dxe5 24. d6 Bd8 25. Q: Building up to the attack for the last couple of moves.
moves.28... Kf8 29. Bxe5: Boom! You will see that this works no matter what. Consult Kasparov your computer or just trust me. It works.
moves.33... Kxg8 34. dxe7: Nothing he can do to stop the pawn.
moves.34... Rg7 35. e8=Q+ Kh7 36. a3: Well my opponent played a good game, but decided it was time to resign and eat a pizza. Good lesson- If you ever lose a hard fought game, eat a pizza.
